body:
Man, I've been around for like what, 5 years give or take? Heck it's been a hell of a ride, and I really enjoyed my time here, but as the reality caught up to me, time flew in the blink of an eye. All the interest and love I once had for this place has slowly diminished. I've acknowledged my lack of activity and interest, which is why I stepped down from an official. Now I must pack up my bags and leave with a good, heart warming goodbye. I don't think I'll ever forget my 5 years around here, from McZone to now, I've met a lot of great people. Some are still around, while others have departed. Now, I want to keep this nice and concise, so I'd like to end here with a list of people I wish to thank for a great time, whether they remain here or not...

- Hakkniv
- DoctaPop (poptyler945)
- D00ZiE
- Emmy (Emeraldsword85)
- glitchy1
- Sunrise
- JUBBINATOR
- Mooch
- MLGtino
- Juano
- Julior
- gonzo
- kiawwa
- calwhovian (Lavish)
- Sulorak
- PieZ
- Anderson
- Sho (Spicytunaroll9)
- FaceToWin
- izjust4fun
- Howsie
- ironsoldier
- Yoav
- sfkwww
- pizza334
- Princezz_Dubstep
- Gilleteracer
- gaboelmejor
- Hunting_Chick
- RefuseToSink
- Splade
- Stimulating
- Upsoar
- ViolentBoo
- lgmatias
- Deltadragon222
- pope_panda
- Cyclones59
- Tazz
- BmB
- killerbye22
- Swaaaaaaggg23JORDAn
- TheTNTDude
- Dolla
- Midnightstorm
- FrostedCupcakez
- pablocz (And literally all of PeruanCombo jajajaj)
- Mari
- lilgreg15

*I might have missed a few, tried to really think from years back, so my apologies*

Enjoy youth kids, like seriously, reality catches up fast.
On behalf of your one eyed pal, I bid you all farewell. ~Cyclops
